com.googlecode.sarasvati.impl

Class BaseProcessDefinitionResolver<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.sarasvati.impl.BaseProcessDefinitionResolver<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the source to translate into a ProcessDefinition
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProcessDefinitionResolver
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultFileXmlProcessDefinitionResolver

    public abstract class BaseProcessDefinitionResolver<T>
extends Object
implements ProcessDefinitionResolver
    This class is a generic implementation of the ProcessDefinitionResolver interface. The goal of a ProcessDefinitionResolver is to map a given name to a ProcessDefinition. The actual translation of a giver source into a ProcessDefinition is performed by a ProcessDefinitionTranslator. This class will thus map the name with a source of type from an internal repository, and then call the provided ProcessDefinitionTranslator on that source, thus effectively returning the expected ProcessDefinition.
    Author:
    vkirsch
    See Also:
    ProcessDefinitionTranslator

    • Constructor Detail

      • BaseProcessDefinitionResolver

        public BaseProcessDefinitionResolver(ProcessDefinitionTranslator<T> translator)
        Build a new process definition resolver without a repository of sources to lookup. Sources can be added later by calling addSource(Object)
        Parameters:
        translator - The translator to use to translate a source of type into a ProcessDefinition

      • BaseProcessDefinitionResolver

        public BaseProcessDefinitionResolver(ProcessDefinitionTranslator<T> translator,
                             List<T> sources)
        Build a process definition resolver that will resolve a name to a that will then be translated to a ProcessDefinition via the provided ProcessDefinitionTranslator. The ProcessDefinitionResolver.resolve(String) method will match the name it is provided with a via the result of a call to the toString() method of each element of the provided list.
        Parameters:
        translator - The translator to use to translate a source of type into a ProcessDefinition
        sources - The sources that will form the repository used to resolve a name into a ProcessDefinition via the translator
        See Also:
        ProcessDefinitionResolver.resolve(String)

      • BaseProcessDefinitionResolver

        public BaseProcessDefinitionResolver(ProcessDefinitionTranslator<T> translator,
                             Map<String,T> map)
        Build a process definition resolver that will resolve a name to a that will then be translated to a ProcessDefinition via the provided ProcessDefinitionTranslator. The ProcessDefinitionResolver.resolve(String) method will match the name it is provided with a via the provided map.
        Parameters:
        translator - The translator to use to translate a source of type into a ProcessDefinition
        map - The sources repository used to resolve a name into a ProcessDefinition via the translator
        See Also:
        ProcessDefinitionResolver.resolve(String)
